What is the stage of pratyekabuddhas?
It should be understood that this stage has five aspects:
first, the spiritual lineage;
second, the path; third, practice;

What is the spiritual lineage of pratyekabuddhas?
It is said that one should correctly understand this through three characteristics.
First, the nature of a pratyekabuddha, before attaining that enlightenment, has a lineage with little defilement.
Because of this, one does not delight in noisy places.
One deeply delights in tranquil places.
Second, the nature of a pratyekabuddha, before attaining that enlightenment, has a lineage with little compassion.
Because of this, one does not delight in teaching the true Dharma and benefiting sentient beings.
One deeply delights in the tranquility of little thought and work.
Third, the nature of a pratyekabuddha, before attaining that enlightenment, has a lineage with middling faculties.
This is the type that engages in pride.
Because of this, one deeply aspires to attain enlightenment without a teacher or opponent.
